hanzi-su-wiki:
俊

Значения

Превосходный, замечательный

Мнемоника

Справа — медленная походка за гробом покойника 允. Элемент 夂 означает, что каждый шаг дается с трудом. В целом — неторопливый человек 亻, знающий себе цену. Важная, лучшая персона.
purpleculture_pinyin:
jùn
smart; eminent; handsome; talented
умная; выдающийся; красивый; талантливый

zùn
(dialectal pronunciation of 俊 ); cool; neat
(диалектное произношение 俊); прохладно; аккуратный
rtega_mnemonic:
俊俊RStalented, capable, handsome
  • man 亻 walking slowly 夋: handsom fellow with a lot of talent
purpleculture_info:
Pictophonetic: 夋 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
Antonyms: 丑
purpleculture_examples:
英俊 [ yīng jùn ]: handsome
俊俏 [ jùn qiào ]: attractive and intelligent; charming; elegant
俊秀 [ jùn xiù ]: well-favored; elegant; pretty
忍俊不禁 [ rěn jùn bù jīn ]: cannot help laughing; unable to restrain a smile
俊美 [ jùn měi ]: pretty; handsome
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 夋 [ qūn ] to dawdle; the emperor Yao's father
heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T doesn't go for them but still thinks some prostitutes are pretty. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: sagacious, person, streetwalker, Ministry of silly walks, John Cleese, license, elbow, human legs, walking legs
koohiiStory1: The entire town wants to get rid of legal prostitutes, but the sagacious Mr T realizes that they are a benefit to the economy and society. So he lets the sa-geishas stay.
koohiiStory2: (re: sweetneet) Since he is not very sagacious, Mr. T failed his driver´s license and now needs to resort to his walking legs to get around.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader of all the spiders is a genius! Spiders are already pretty smart. They can weave complex homes and traps in one web. They even know where not to step so they don't get caught. But the leader knows everything. It made itself a little webbed computer and everything!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine seeing the leader of the spiders weaving it's own little spider computer. Doing spider math, and spider chemistry. It's a genius!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you watch the spider genius you realize that soon (しゅん) spiders will take over the humans. They're just way smarter than us. Soon we'll be the bugs.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Soon we'll be slaves to the genius spiders. Soon we'll be the flies.
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), 儿 (ножки), 厶 (значок МУ), 夂 (зима)
Ru_trainchinese: jùn: (прил) умный, красивый; выдающийся, талантливый
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) with a license to go (夋) is a genius
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T doesn't go for them but still thinks some prostitutes are pretty. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From " people " to "夋" sound. The original meaning is a person with outstanding ability. "Shuowen": "Chun, talents are also thousands of people. From the people, the sound." Such as "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou Shang": "Respect the virtuous and enable, and the wise man is in power, then the world's people are happy and willing to stand in their dynasty." "Huainanzi. "Thai Clan": "Thus, those who have known over ten thousand people are called the British, those who have thousands of people are considered handsome, those of a hundred are called heroes, and those of ten are called outstanding."

" Jun " implies excellence and excellence. Such as "Pipe. "Water Land": "The land is the origin of all things, the root of all beings, the beauty and the evil, the virtuous, the unworthy, and the foolish." "Han. "The Legend of Rulin": "(Ni) Kuan has good talents, first met Emperor Wu, and studied the language and classics."

" Jun " also means that the appearance is outstanding and beautiful. For example, the fourth fold of the first book of "The Story of the West Chamber" by Wang Shifu of the Yuan Dynasty: "Twisting your body in various ways, showing off your beauty in front of others." Feng Menglong of the Ming Dynasty "Awakening the World and Hengyan." "Wu Ya Nei Zhou Going for an Appointment": "The master has a woman who is twenty-eight years old. She is quite charming. He heard his father say that his dream is omnipotent. Dao Pan Lang is the number one champion. Mu, Wuyutong money."
humanum_short_description_en: From " people " to "夋" sound. The original meaning is a person with outstanding ability, and by extension it means excellence and outstanding.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「夋」聲。本義是才能出眾的人。《說文》：「俊，材千人也。从人，夋聲。」如《孟子．公孫丑上》：「尊賢使能，俊傑在位，則天下之士皆悅而願立於其朝矣。」《淮南子．泰族》：「故知過萬人者謂之英，千人者謂之俊，百人者謂之豪，十人者謂之傑。」

　　「俊」引申表示卓越、傑出。如《管子．水地》：「地者，萬物之本原，諸生之根菀也，美惡、賢不肖、愚俊之所生也。」《漢書．儒林傳》：「（倪）寬有俊材，初見武帝，語經學。」

　　「俊」也表示外表出色、漂亮。如元代王實甫《西廂記》第一本第四折：「扭捏著身子兒百般做作，來往向人前賣弄俊俏。」明代馮夢龍《醒世恒言．吳衙內鄰舟赴約》：「主人有女年方二八，頗有姿色，聽得父親說其夢兆，道潘郎有狀元之分，在窗下偷覷，又見他儀容俊雅，心懷契慕，無繇通款。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「夋」聲。本義是才能出眾的人，引申表示卓越、傑出。

從「 人 」，「 夋 」聲。本義是才能出眾的人。《說文》：「俊，材千人也。从人，夋聲。」如《孟子．公孫丑上》：「尊賢使能，俊傑在位，則天下之士皆悅而願立於其朝矣。」《淮南子．泰族》：「故知過萬人者謂之英，千人者謂之俊，百人者謂之豪，十人者謂之傑。」 「 俊 」引申表示卓越、傑出。如《管子．水地》：「地者，萬物之本原，諸生之根菀也，美惡、賢不肖、愚俊之所生也。」《漢書．儒林傳》：「（倪）寬有俊材，初見武帝，語經學。」 「 俊 」也表示外表出色、漂亮。如元代王實甫《西廂記》第一本第四折：「扭捏著身子兒百般做作，來往向人前賣弄俊俏。」明代馮夢龍《醒世恒言．吳衙內鄰舟赴約》：「主人有女年方二八，頗有姿色，聽得父親說其夢兆，道潘郎有狀元之分，在窗下偷覷，又見他儀容俊雅，心懷契慕，無繇通款。」
From " people" to " 夋" sound. The original meaning is a person with outstanding ability. "Shuowen": "Chun, talents are also thousands of people. From the people, the sound." Such as "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou Shang": "Respect the virtuous and enable, and the wise man is in power, then the world's people are happy and willing to stand in their dynasty." "Huainanzi. "Thai Clan": "Thus, those who have known over ten thousand people are called the British, those who have thousands of people are considered handsome, those of a hundred are called heroes, and those of ten are called outstanding." " Jun" implies excellence and excellence. Such as "Pipe. "Water Land": "The land is the origin of all things, the root of all beings, the beauty and the evil, the virtuous, the unworthy, and the foolish." "Han. "The Legend of Rulin": "(Ni) Kuan has good talents, first met Emperor Wu, and studied the language and classics." " Jun" also means that the appearance is outstanding and beautiful. For example, the fourth fold of the first book of "The Story of the West Chamber" by Wang Shifu of the Yuan Dynasty: "Twisting your body in various ways, showing off your beauty in front of others." 俊字的基本解释

俊
jùn
才智出众的人：俊杰。俊伟。俊彦（才智杰出的人）。俊爽。俊造（学识造诣很深的人）。
容貌美丽：俊俏。俊美。俊秀。俊逸（俊美洒脱，不同凡俗）。英俊。
古同“峻”，大。
俏丑

俊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jùn］
［《廣韻》子峻切，去稕，精。］
亦作“儁1”。亦作“1”。“雋2”的被通假字。
(1)才德超卓的人。
(2)杰出；卓越。
(3)雄健；英武。
(4)漂亮；美丽。
(5)玲珑可爱。
(6)味美；可口。
(7)使其有面子。
(8)通“駿”。大。见“俊風”。
(9)通“”。
[②]［shùn］
［《集韻》輪閏切，去稕，書。］
通“舜1”。

俊字的英文翻译

◎ 俊
a person of outstanding talent, handsome, pretty

俊字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　俊； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页104第15
【唐韻】子峻切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】祖峻切，?音儁。【說文】材千人也。【馬氏曰】智過千人曰俊。【北史·蘇綽傳】萬人之秀曰俊。【禮·王制】司徒論選士之秀者，而升之學，曰俊士。又【月令】孟夏命大尉贊桀俊，遂賢良。　又與儁峻?通。【書·堯典】克明俊德。【註】俊同峻。　又同畯。【史記·宋世家】引書洪範，俊民用章，作畯民。　又通作駿。【史記·屈原傳】誹駿疑傑。　又與?同。【戰國策】世無東郭俊盧氏之狗。【註】又作逡。

俊字的源字形

俊字的起名意思

：1、相貌清秀好看，雄健，英武，如俊俏；2、指才智出众，高尚，杰出，卓越，才貌超群，如俊杰。

Jun
Basic explanation of words
Jun
jùn
Talented person: Junjie. Junwei. Toshihiko (a man of outstanding intelligence). Jun Shuang. Junzo (a person with deep knowledge).
Beautiful appearance: handsome. Handsome. Junsu. Jun Yi (beautiful, free and easy, extraordinary). handsome.
Gu Tong is "june" and big.
Pretty ugly
Jun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jùn］
["Guangyun" sub-junk cut, go to 稕, fine. ]
Also known as "Jun 1". Also known as "1". "Jun 2" was passed falsely.
(1) A person who is extremely talented and virtuous.
(2) Outstanding; outstanding.
(3) Vigorous; heroic.
(4) Beautiful; beautiful.
(5) Exquisite and lovely.
(6) Delicious; delicious.
(7) Make it face.
(8) Through "Jun". Big. See "Jun Feng".
(9) Pass "".
[②]［shùn］
["Jiyun" round run-cut, go to 稕, book. ]
Same as "Shun 1".
Jun

◎ Jun
a person of outstanding talent, handsome, pretty
Jun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　 Jun; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 104 15
[Tang Yun] Zi Jun cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Zu Jun cut,? Yin Jun. [Speaking] There are thousands of talents. [Ma's said] Knowing a thousand people is a good man. [Bei Shi·Su Chuo Biography] The beauty of ten thousand people is called Jun. 【Rite·Royal System】Situ talks about the talents who choose the talents, and the scholars who are promoted are called the talents. Also [Moon Order] Meng Xia ordered Captain Jiejun to praise Jiejun, and he was virtuous.　 And Jun Jun again? 【Book·Yaodian】Keming Junde. [Note] Jun Tongjun.　The same thing again. [Historical Records·Song Family] Quoting from the book Hong Fan, Junmin used a chapter as a master.　Through Zuojun again. [Historical Records·Qu Yuan Biography] Defeating Jun Suspect.　Same as? 【Warring States Policy】Guo Jun Lu's dog in the world. [Note] It is also known as "Fang".
Jun
Source glyph
Jun
Name meaning
:1. The appearance is beautiful and beautiful, majestic, heroic, such as handsome; 2. Refers to outstanding talents, noble, outstanding, outstanding, outstanding talents, such as handsome.
形声字。人(1)表意,篆书之形像侧身而立的人,表示俊是才智出众的人;愛(jin)表声,参为行动敏捷,而才智出众
者言行必敏捷。本义是才智出众的人。

III собств.
Цзюнь (фамилия)
Radicals: ｲ, 夋  (leader, spider)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader of all the spiders is a genius! Spiders are already pretty smart. They can weave complex homes and traps in one web. They even know where not to step so they don't get caught. But the leader knows everything. It made itself a little webbed computer and everything!
Imagine seeing the leader of the spiders weaving it's own little spider computer. Doing spider math, and spider chemistry. It's a genius!
Reading Mnemonic
As you watch the spider genius you realize that soon (しゅん) spiders will take over the humans. They're just way smarter than us. Soon we'll be the bugs.
Soon we'll be slaves to the genius spiders. Soon we'll be the flies.
